lyrics:
10 contributorsway back when lyricsverse 1
we never had that much to do
so we just lay around in someones house
someday ill have it all again just like way back when

verse 2
back then wed sleep until the afternoon
then wed just get up and go outside
open a window let the breeze blow in forget everything

chorus
yeah those will be the days that ill be missing
when im old and when im grey and when i stop working
i hope that i can say when all my days are done we were just having fun

verse 3
well wed go drinking in the afternoon
lie out on the grass and fall asleep
oh will i ever see that girl again the girl from way back when

verse 4
yeah we used to share a cigarette
and throw together everything we had
and then go driving in my parents car
we never strayed too far
you might also likechorus
oh yeah those will be the days that ill be missing
when im old and when im grey and when i stop working
i hope that i can say when all my days are done that i had my fun

postchorus
one two three four
those will be the days that i had my fun

chorus
again
yeah time can move so fast
some things arent made to last
so heres to you my dear old friend
from way back when
again

chorus
yeah those will be the days that ill be missing
when im old and when im grey and when i stop working
i hope that i can say when all my days are done that i had my fun3embed
